title: Pakistan wants strong ties with Azerbaijan: Foreign Secy
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 29 (APP): Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood on Tuesday said Pakistan desired strong relations with Azerbaijan and would continue to extend support on its Nagorno-Karabakh issue.
The Foreign Secretary expressed these views as outgoing Azeri Ambassador Ali Alizada paid a farewell call on him here at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
The Foreign Secretary lauded the contribution of Ambassador Alizada in deepening the Pak-Azerbaijan relations.
He also thanked for the support of Azerbaijan for the Kashmir cause.
FS Sohail Mahmood received Azeri Amb @Ali_F_Alizada for farewell call. Lauded his rich contribution to deepening of   relations; reiterated  ’s resolve to strengthen coop. in all fields; reaffirmed support on Nagorno-Karabakh & thanked for Azeri support for Kashmir cause. pic.twitter.com/LhwtnNoNs5
— Spokesperson  MoFA (@ForeignOfficePk) June 29, 2021
